title: Electrical Engineering Logos
descriptionStart: Can you recognize these logos from electrical engineering companies?
descriptionEnd: You have helped Ruby recognize all the logos!

steps.text: Ruby has a collection of various devices and components from electrical engineering. Some of them have a logo printed on them. Can you help identify the companies behind the logos?

On a chip, Ruby can recognize the following symbol...


![Logo](ee_logos/AnalogDevices_Logo.png)


...who manufactured this chip?

Several of Ruby's microcontrollers have the following logo:


![Logo](ee_logos/Arduino_Logo.png)


Who manufactured these microcontrollers?

On one of the microprocessors, Ruby finds the following logo:


![Logo](ee_logos/Atmel_Logo.png)


Who manufactured this microprocessor?

On one of the microcontrollers, this 'M' is visible:


![Logo](ee_logos/MicrochipTechnology_Logo.png)


Who manufactured this microcontroller?

A chip has the following initials printed on it:


![Logo](ee_logos/NXP_Logo.png)


Who manufactured this chip?

Many of Ruby's logic gates have the following logo:


![Logo](ee_logos/STMicroelectronics_Logo.png)


Who manufactured these gates?

Ruby finds a specification for a processor with this strange checkerboard-like logo:


![Logo](ee_logos/TSMC_Logo.png)


Who issued this specification?
Wow! You were able to identify all the devices and components and helped Ruby recognize the companies behind the logos. Well done!
